task.title: How to Add Numbers
task.shortdesc: Here are instructions for using the addition feature of the JPS Calculator app.

taskbody.prereq: To successfully add numbers, you must be familiar with the arithmetic process of addition.
taskbody.result: The result of the addition is displayed.
taskbody.example: You want to add 2 to 3. The equation looks like this: 2 + 3 = 5. You enter 2, press the plus button, enter 3, and press the equals button. The result 5 appears on the screen.
